name: Groggo the cursed Doggo
description:
Don't let Groggo kill people!
This game is a submission for the GMTK jam 2021.

Highly recommend you  P l a y   T h e   T u t o r i a l  first.

I f   t h e   g a m e   d o e s n ' t   l o a d :  Refresh the page
I f   t h e   c o n t r o l s   d o n ' t   w o r k :  Click on the game window

The timer that shows how long you’ve survived for is broken because I forgot to add two lines of code… welp can’t change that now  :<
